Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Baulkham Hills (Greater Western Sydney), Adina Apartment Hotel Norwest is minutes from Norwest Business Park and Castle Hill Country Club. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Hillsong Church and Sydney Ice Arena.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 106 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Satellite programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Adina Apartment Hotel Norwest.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Adina Apartment Hotel Norwest.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Located in Baulkham Hills (Greater Western Sydney), Adina Apartment Hotel Norwest is minutes from Norwest Business Park and Castle Hill Country Club. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Hillsong Church and Sydney Ice Arena.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Norwest Business Park - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Castle Hill Country Club - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hillsong Church - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sydney Ice Arena - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Powerhouse Discovery Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hills Centre - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Norwest Private Hospital - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Bella Vista Farm - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Castle Hill Community Centre - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Castle Towers Shopping Centre - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Baulkham Hills Library - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Castle Hill Heritage Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Yattenden Park - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Rouse Hill Village Centre - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Westmead Hospital - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Adina Apartment Hotel Norwest is Sydney, NSW (SYD-Kingsford Smith Intl.) - 28.9 km / 18 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
